Usually if its a biweekly thing people go for the 15th and 30th of the month. Everyone at Asha(it's an Aveda salon)seems really nice and helpful which is good. My home phone has these issues that ummm well, it doesnt ring all the time, and it is PISSING me off. I might have to go buy a cheapy new phone. Anywho, point is, when I was awoken by the dogs at 5am this morning I noticed that my light on my phone was flashing which means I have a message. Lately I have been getting messages from SBC voicemail tips, and the message gets sent around 10am but I dont get the message until almost 10PM, so I thought it was that. Nope, it was Scott. Telling me that he forgot to tell me something when we had gotten off the phone and it was sweet dreams, and he loves me. And I saved the message. I LOVE when he leaves me sweet messages like that. LOVELOVELOVELOVELOVE it. I KNOW gag you, well go ahead and gag I LIKE IT! ANYWHO FIVE A.M. I WAS WIDE AWAKE, like oh I took a NAP NNNNNNNNNOOOOOOOOOO problem. Yea well thankfully Jennie at Asha asked me if I could work Sunday instead of tonight and come in on Saturday to do paperwork. I woke this morning and faxed some resumes hopefully MAYBE SOMEONE will call me back? Yes? COME ON FOLKS! Aggravating. GOOD thing was when I got dressed, I dunno if I had worn them already or what, but they smelled fresh, my jeans were looser. Im not stepping on that damn evil scale cause it will tell me differently then I feel and want to see. Ah well.
SO I go into the shop this morning like a bat outta hell on speed. And we have two shops connected. In order to get to the second shop you need to DUH...walk through the first one. So i do. One of the guys who I have been talking to who is probably the ONLY guy here my age, is in the shop. So is another guy. I say hey guys,as I am flying past and when I come back I dont say anything. Elg and I are talking a few moments ago, and hes like so ummmm whats up with you and Scott? I was like we're good, and I go into my happy couple, and he stops me shakes his head, and goes no THAT Scott, and points to Scott in the shop. I laugh and Im like N O T H I N G, I said Mike Im PRACTICALLY MARRIED. (I was asked several times last night if I were engaged) No, Scott is just a friend. He goes, OHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH. Okay. Like ALL OF A SUDDEN IT MADE SENSE OOOOOHHHHHHHHHHH. I was perplexed so I proceeded to ask him what he meant by OOOOHHHHHHH. Elg says that many guys in the shop thought Scott and I HAD to be sleeping together cause NO girl as cute and pretty as I would want to JUST TALK to Scott, because he isnt that great looking. As explained to Nikki last nite, he has a unibrow. And it kinda really is distracting. ANYWHO, so I went and talked to Mike about it. He was like Elg probably said it to get under your skin...arent you like practically married. I laughed. It just bothers me that people think that. But I have no proof unless i have a camera crew follow  me around that the only thing Work Scott and I EVER do is talk on the phone. Okay. Mr. Rogers Killer is here. I must go you know...work. UNTIL THE NEXT TIME.......

Maybe if I had some prozac I wouldnt want to breakdown crying and I wouldnt want to jump in from of a stopped bus. I dunno what it is lately but all the songs, that are suppose to make people happy and go gee I AM loved, make me happy, but like almost so happy I want to cry. 
I wish someone could put me to sleep for a day, remove my brain and the worry center, and solve ALL my problems, from what I am suppose to do with my life, to what SOCKS i should wear with what outfit. My heart hurts. 
I am sad. 
I am confused. 
I am annoyed. 
I am stressed. 
I want to scream so loud that because it felt good to do that, I can cry. I want to sobb deep heavy sobbs, and not feel depressed but feel like that is what I needed all along. 
I am unhappy about my weight despite my better smaller portion eating habits. 
I miss my friends. 
I want to go to a bar and be REALLY loud and singing and get incredibly shit faced, and have someone drive me home. 
I want someone else besides my boyfriend and the old guys I work with find me attractive. 
I need a different job. 
I need to have a breakdown.
I want someone to just KNOW what is wrong, and hug me and go I know sweetie.
I want to be 4 again, when my parents still loved another, and I was my Dad's favorite, and my BIGGEST concern was what fake food dinner I was going to make.
I want my money problems solved.
I want to stop shaking.
I want to kick Jenny that i work with in the head and go you are a MEANMEANMEAN Bitch AND Mr. Rogers DID kill himself because of you (see previous entry).
I want it to be summer.
I need to take back a Sunday morning about two weeks ago.
I need a vacation ironically enough...with my mother.(and NOT because she would pay for it)
I want this depressing phase in my life to be over.
I NEED just for ONCE in my life, people being able to accept that me saying I dont know what is wrong, means JUST that. I dont know what is wrong, something is wrong, something is bothering me...let me figure it out for me self. (YES, ME self).
I need to be able to afford an apartment on my own.
Scott used to watch me sleep for a minute and he must have felt compelled to kiss me, cause he would just kiss me gently. I do the same for him...only he doesnt wake up.
I want a phone call in the middle of the day that just takes me back.
For one day the only thing I want to worry about is what I am going to buy next and NOT feel INCREDIBLY bad for wanting something.
I want to be able to say No and be okay with it.
I must REALLY be going insane because I want to see Scotts family. All of them. Probably because they make me feel more sane.
I want my Aunt to move back out to Streamwood, and go to her house tonight after work, and she would wake up and sit with me and we would talk, and if I wanted to cry she would just hug me.

Im done. I suppose I just have a lot on my chest right now. Im trying to let things happen one day at a time and I cant. The only thing I got really excited about was Emily and I talking about taking a trip to the Dells. I start my second job tonight at Aveda. It should be fun. It will be extra money and if I have figured out right I will be okay rent and bills wise. I plan on paying off both my credit cards so all will be well soon. I dunno. I dunno. I dunno. I feel like a mental patient walking around in my hospital gown and pick at imginary bugs on my arms, and talk outloud to myself. This is sad.

Lets see. Tuesday I went to see my diabetic doctor because at the time my blood sugar had been low for a few days by then. SO then I went to the doctor and came home. No problem. Wednesday I wake up with literally THE WORST CRAMPS EVER EVER EVER. I go to work despite feeling like I was going to vomit. I am work for about an hour and I cant handle it. I feel like I am going to vomit, AND my blood is STILL low. I talk to Mike and he drives me home, while someone follows him. We pull out of the work parking lot and are passing the Addison Ice Rink (it is LITERALLY the next parking lot perpendicular to our lot)and I tell Mike he needs to pull over...I vomit. Im embarassed. We make it home, mind you in one piece. Ive only let Scott drive my car, but Mike was VERY careful about driving my car. So then I talk to my doctor pass out. Scott comes over later and we talk about me and school, us, him and school, and it was a heavy talk but it got a lot out. THEN I am up literally alllllllllllllll night. At about 3am, my dogs go SPASTIC and just start barking and it is nuts. It scared the crap outta me. SO my blood being low now for five days I stay home again. I FINALLY get my period and I am STILL cramping btw. I call in, Mike calls me at 4 and leaves me a voice mail cause i slept through it. I call back as I was asked to and my heart was pounding that I was going to be fired, but Mike asks me kinda sheepishly to bring a note in tomorrow. I call and get one from my doctor. My doctor saw me off the record on Tuesday me not having any proof of ins. and having no money. Okay fine. I end up talking to the Scott I work with and I explained the story to him, and he was like you KNOW that is JENNYS doing dont you? That was my idea from the get go. I knew Mike knows I am sick but SHE is just such a bleep bleep bleep bleep bleep. and add some more bleeps in there. This just proves what a snatch this Jenny person is. I DO understand that most companies ask for a note when you miss work like this, but when I was in the hospital they NEVER asked for a note. What a crock of shit this is. Im just angered at her. THIS is the other reason why I would leave this job before I am asked to leave. When I talked to the other Scott, he told me to try and ignore her as much as possible because she is like this, and there is nothing I can do about her. What a wench. Tomorrow I am for sure returning to work. I have an interview for a part time job at Aveda. Sweet cash for part time work. THEN Jenny and I are hanging out. She is going home on Saturday. I dunno. I am kinda really stressed out so right now I need a good dose of Friends. The television show....

Last nite I went to Cyndis. Her and Ben have broken up and was in need of one of her best friends and I was bored and I wanted to be there for her like she was when Scott and I werent together. Greatness. The roads were pretty bad, not slippery but slushy and well snowy. Got home about 11:30 and fooled around on the internet. Because I had taken a deep long nap eariler, I was kinda awake but tired. I was afraid I wouldnt be able to sleep. I finally slumbered but awoke alllllll sorts of wanting to go back to bed. Made myself a crappy lunch. Not in the junk food sense just in the sense I didnt make myself a lot to eat. I talked with Emily this morning and wished I had more time to chat with her but I didnt. Then I got to work and my desk was in shambles. My in-box was stuffed more then a thanksgiving turkey and there was this HUGE ass box of mail. IN TWO WEEKS NO ONE DID ANYTHING with the mail, but PUT IT IN THE BOX! How annoying. SO now i am sitting here going I miss my Pumpkin, I miss Scott, I miss my friends, I miss School. Yes, folks I said it...school. Lately I have been thinking HOW I could work two jobs, AND go to school. I dont know how to. I dont want to. I cant ask my mom to do it, cause she wont. and my dad doesnt have the money that leaves.... me. I thought about going to Cosmotology school. It seems like fun, but then again I am not really about making 5.00 an hour plus tips. I'll pass thanks. I know its stupid to think like that but its true. I dont know what to do now. Im thinking about getting back into the medical field. But I just dont know WHAT I want to do in the medical field. My dream has ALWAYS been to work at Luthern General. I just have to start applying at hospitals. I dont WANT to quit the job I have now, but I also am paying $40.00 a WEEK for my health ins. PLUS whatever my co-pay is (I have been paying outta pocket because BCBS FUCKED UP with MY ins.). Ive been looking but not with all my heart because I sit here and go I have kinda a sweet deal here. I get two weeks off (unpaid which bites) in Dec., one week off in July and they are pretty uncaring in the sense if I miss a day here and there they are like well we are glad you are feeling better. BUT THEN there is Jenny. Jenny who is the cause of my late ins. entry. Jenny who buggs the FUCK outta me when I do something wrong. I just dont know. I am between a rock and a hard spot. BIG TIME. Taking a new job means, getting YET AGAIN, new ins., making new friends, learning new tasks, and starting allllllllll over again. I might just look at the herald.com, and see what kind of health jobs they are looking for. BLAH. This bites! If someone knows all the answers, I could use a handful.

Where to start? Tuesday night I went to Scotts. He and I went to Jewel until 2am. I didnt go to bed until 2:30 because Scott didnt feel good and I was unpacking the groceries. Went to bed and woke up. We spent all day laying around being lazy just hanging out. It was fun. We played Monopoly and I landed on a property that I was REFUSING to give up more of my properties, so I go I lost. I REFUSED to give up my properties. I went to get ready, he laid there and watched Cops. SHOCKED?!?!?!? I was done getting ready and he went to get ready while I tried to calm my sister down, and iron his shirt at the same time. After it was all said and done he looked handsome. Just a simple Old Navy shirt and jeans but he looked good. We went to Macaroni Grill. We waited despite the fact we had called ahead. It wasnt a long wait maybe, 10 minutes. We got sat RIGHT by the door. Our server was late, and it took her forever to bring out drinks, AND to no fault of her own the mozt. sticks had some green salrento shit on it. WAS IT REMOVED FROM THE BILL DESPITE THE FACT OF NOT EATING THEM.....NO! Scott for the FIRST time ever tipped horribly. We were about to pay when Heidi and Brian put down a gift card! I requested that if Maggianos was booked that Heidi call Cheesecake Factory. But she totally disregarded that, and booked the Grill here. Okay fine. It wouldnt have beena  big deal but it was rude. It woulda been ONE thing to be like hey we have a gift card you mind going here? No they negelected to tell us that. I was miffed. I thought I was just seeing things, but Scott nicely pointed out that that was true. SO. We get back to the apartment. Wait for Heidi and Brian to get there, so they arrive and we are all hanging out. I had about 3/4 of a glass of some malted chamange or something and Scott had two plain glasses. There were two bottles of the plain stuff, and two bottles of the malted stuff. Now, minus our three (combined together)glasses together between Scott and I, they finished THOSE TWO BOTTLES A PIECE! OMGosh. They were both tipsy when they left. Mind you we were drinking out of those beer glasses NOT MUGS, that they give you at a bar. But they were shorter. They dont even hold a whole can of pop. NOW you can see how much they are drinking. So we go to bed and wake up and go to IHOP after I am conversing to Emily via IMs. IHOP sucked. We came back and napped. We woke up and started straightening up the apartment, because it was in mayhem from the other nights. Fine. Then he goes to get on the phone with his brother and...I open my mouth. I opened my mouth because I am the youngest and sometimes I feel I need to stick up for Stevie, and I want him to feel like someone believes in him. I want to be that person. I dont need Stevie to like me, he will if he does. I dont need to convince him to like me. But me opening my mouth started an argument between Scott and I. That was over and done with, and I won a game of Monopoly. WHOOO HOO ME! Lane and Adriane came over and they cooked. And Scott got tipsy. Then he got dizzy. Then he got sick to his tummy. We woke and lets just say things lead to another and I walked out the door. Friday. I spent the late afternoon with my sisters, niece, step brothers, and step sister, Dad and Step Mom. We had a lot of fun swimming and hanging out, and just being a family. I missed it. I missed kissing my Dad good night. I may be 21 years old but I still love my dad. A lot. YES FOLKS. DESPITE the fact what has gone on between us I love him. Scott and I kinda talked for a few that nite but we agreed to disagree. I am going to try and do my best to shut up and not give attitude about his brother. I dunno about this. I am really going to try, but I just have to wait for a situation to present itself again. Anywho. So Maggers didnt sleep very well, which means I had about four hours of sleep. And so I came home and went to bed. Thats about it so far. I am just sitting relaxing. Hoping i will get my room in order, and then I am going to do something. I am going back to low carbing it. I have to. I didnt carecarecare for it but my blood sugar is telling me no different. I have to wait to start working out again though. I hurt my feet at the pool, walking on some kind of plastic mat thing and my feel are KILLING ME! Throbbing if you will. Okay so other good news. S.W.A.T, American Wedding, and Uptown Girls are all on video or are coming to DVD!!!! SWEET! The first two I know for a fact are GREAT movies. But I think I iwll like Uptown Girls. Anywho I am off now.
